name: ZombieBar
description:
Welcome to Zombiebar, the place where your very survival depends on the satisfaction of your customers — Zombies!

Test your waiter skills by filling glasses, recycling drinks, jumping over tables and occasionally shooting some customers.
Oh, and don't forget about your zombie boss! He gets angry if the customers aren't happy.
See how your skills measure up to other zombie waiters online, and enjoy the most respectable job in the zombie world!

Gameplay and rules:
In this free zombie game, the player has to run and shoot walking zombies while refilling empty glasses of the seated ones.
At the beginning of each round you have a bottle that can hold roughly 10 refills. Every refill counts! If you miss more than 3 glasses an alarm will sound. This means the Zombie bar owner is not happy and he will start chasing you.
The only way to get rid of him is to continuously refill the glasses which turns off the alarm. Shooting zombies will give you extra points that are added to your score in the online leaderboard.
You can become a zombie killer not only with your shotgun but also with randomly spawned power-ups that let you run over zombies by driving different vehicles.
Power-ups are free of charge, but some can make you weaker and easier to catch.

How To Play:
Swipe up: Jump
Swipe down: Slide
Swipe down (in air): Fill drinks
Swipe right: Shoot

FEATURES

★ Retro cartoon graphics
★ Power-ups
★ Online leaderboard
★ Zombies!
